original_text: The bright light hurt my eyes so that I could not see. So the men who were with me held my hand. They led me into Damascus.
korean_text: 나는 그 빛의 광채로 말미암아 볼 수 없게 되었으므로 나와 함께 있는 사람들의 손에 끌려 다메섹에 들어갔노라

sentences.original_text: The bright light hurt my eyes
sentences.korean_translation: 밝은 빛이 내 눈을 아프게 했다

sentences.original_text: so that I could not see
So the men who were with me
